name: Live & Evil
description:
Live & Evil 

Incarn Live, a cute little robot and his shadow, Evil. Use his ability to switch with his dark twin to resolve puzzles and escape through portals. 

How to play ?

This project was entirely made in 4 days for the CodingBlocks #22 with the theme "It's following me".

Our team

  • Zaksley    -  Developper and Game Designer
  • Drenaya  -  Developper and Pixel Artist
  • Thalia       -  Music
